channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Information Queue
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Information Queue

item.title: CVE-2020-4292|2024-09-17T01:31:43.740Z -- ibm -- security%20information%20queue
item.description: IBM Security Information Queue (ISIQ) 1.0.0, 1.0.1, 1.0.2, 1.0.3, and 1.0.4 uses a cross-domain policy file that includes domains that should not be trusted which could disclose sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 176335.

item.title: CVE-2019-4161|2024-09-17T01:05:45.780Z -- ibm -- security%20information%20queue
item.description: IBM Security Information Queue (ISIQ) 1.0.0, 1.0.1, and 1.0.2 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 158660.
